com.stormpath.sdk.servlet.account.event

Interface VerifiedAccountRequestEvent

  • All Superinterfaces:
    AccountRequestEvent, RequestEvent
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultVerifiedAccountRequestEvent

    public interface VerifiedAccountRequestEvent
extends AccountRequestEvent
    An event triggered when processing an HttpServletRequest that indicates an account's email address has been verified.
    Since:
    1.0.RC3

      • Methods inherited from interface com.stormpath.sdk.servlet.account.event.AccountRequestEvent
